channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Should You Subscribe to Garmin Connect+? (2025)
item.description: Every fitness company has jumped on the AI-powered fitness subscription bandwagon. Should you?

item.title: Best Sheets for Every Bed and Budget (2025): Cotton, Linen, Bamboo
item.description: Whether you’re shopping for cotton percale or silky bamboo, we’ve slept on nearly 100 different bedsheets to find the best ones.

item.title: EU cyber agency confirms ransomware attack causing airport disruptions
item.description: A cyberattack targeting Collins Aerospace, a provider of airport check-in systems, sparked delays and disrupted flights across Europe over the weekend...

item.title: Unit 221B raises $5 million to help track and disrupt today’s top hacking groups
item.description: The seed funding raise will help Unit 221B expand its threat intelligence platform, which tracks the English-speaking youth hacking phenomenon.

item.title: Livestream: Tech Went All in on Trump. Now What?
item.description: Our panel of experts discuss what the tech industry's allegiance to Trump really means, and how it will shape our future.

item.title: The Best Cat Litter Depends on Your Cat and Type of Litter Box
item.description: Between clay, tofu, crystal, and more, here's how to determine the best type of cat litter for your home (and cat).

item.title: Louisiana Hands Meta a Tax Break and Power for Its Biggest Data Center
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg’s company faces backlash after rowing back promises to create between 300 and 500 new jobs to man its subsidiary’s new data center.

item.title: 5 days left to save up to $668 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 pass

item.title: Lift off: First look at the Space Stage agenda at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: First reveal of the Space Stage agenda at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, October 27-29 in San Francisco. Whether you’re a space junkie, a startup builder, o...

item.title: eBay to acquire social marketplace platform Tise
item.description: eBay’s acquisition of Tise indicates that it's looking to modernize its platform to attract younger shoppers, expand its social commerce tools, and bu...
